itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, November 13, 2013
contentencoded: Facebook warned a number of users this week to change their passwords ASAP. But it's not the usual "update your password" request. The social network is reacting to continuing fallout from a massive hack that occurred last month. The original hack was of a large number of personal accounts for software made by the company Adobe. Investigative reporter Brian Krebs tells Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson what happened.
description: A massive hack last month is having a continuing impact on the social network.
